H0.text: Nitrogen returns to the soil as ammonium ions during the decomposition of a dead organism.

H1.text: Potassium returns to the soil as ammonium ions upon the death of an organism during composition.

H2.text: Calcium returns to the soil as ammonium ions upon the death of an organism during decomposition.

H3.text: Hydrogen returns to the soil as ammonium ions upon the death of an organism during composition.

A4.text: Bacteria and fungi convert organic nitrogen from dead organisms into ammonia and ammonium through ammonification or mineralization.
